resources.string: Get to know yourself a little deeper by taking our tests
Get motivated for the whole day
Stay up to date with events from the world of psychology
Visit our library and get acquainted with the works of specialists

This site offers you various types of sources, such as: news about psychology, books, terms of psychological words, various life hacks for the soul, as well as a list of psychologists who can help you

Instruction
You are offered a questionnaire.
The questionnaire consists of 16 statements (questions), each of which has 3 continuations (answers).
We emphasize that all the answers are equivalent, there are no correct or incorrect ones among them.
Your task:
• read each of the statements together with its two possible continuations;
• choose the continuation that is typical for you in most life situations.
Answer frankly, without thinking about the answers for a long time.
